property.name: dfs.namenode.http-address
property.description: The address and the base port where the dfs namenode web ui will listen on.

property.name: dfs.namenode.secondary.http-address
property.description: The secondary namenode http server address and port. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: dfs.namenode.secondary.https-address
property.description: The secondary namenode HTTPS server address and port. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.
